title: Bump concordium base, prepare for release.
body:

title: Revise block stats so that it will only stop after a designated time.
body:
## Purpose

Change the block-stats script so that it stops only after reaching the given time.

Also migrates the block stats to V2 interface.

Additionally make the conversion of timestamp to datetime fallible.

## Checklist

title: Updated example's default values
body:
## Purpose

`localhost:10001` -> `localhost:20000` for all GRPCv2 examples. Also removed wrong default for account parameter in `v2_get_account_non_finalized_transactions.rs`

title: Fixed readme links
Bump base and SDK version in preparation for release.
body:
## Purpose

Since concordium-base requires rust 1.62 the sdk now also requires it.

This propagates the version changes. In preparation for release on crates.io the docs job is also removed since it is no longer needed.

## Checklist

title: Move `ContractTraceElement` and supporting types to base
body:
## Purpose

These types are also needed in the integration testing library.

- Also moves:
  - `ContractEvent`
  - `InstanceUpdatedEvent`
  - `MAX_ALLOWED_INVOKE_ENERGY`

Depends on:

- Re-export for backwards compatability

title: Handle unification of parameter and module reference types
body:
## Purpose

Handle unification of the parameter and module reference types.

Depends on:
- https://github.com/Concordium/concordium-base/pull/333
- https://github.com/Concordium/concordium-contracts-common/pull/73
- https://github.com/Concordium/concordium-contracts-common/pull/75
- https://github.com/Concordium/concordium-base/pull/334

## Changes

- Use `OwnedParameter` and `ModuleReference` instead of the now deprecated `Parameter` and `ModuleRef`.

title: Commit generated protos
body:
## Purpose

This achieves two things - the user does not need a protobuf compiler to use the
SDK. - we decouple the version of the api in concordium-base from version used
in the SDK. The upstream version has changes which we don't want to expose in
the SDK yet until they are available in the node.

## Changes

- Commit generated proto-files to the repository so that users don't have to have protobuf installed.
- Add documentation related to this.
- Add a new internal feature `generate-protos` that can be used to regenerate Rust sources from protobuf schemas.

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the style of this project.
- [ ] The code compiles without warnings.
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of the changes.
- [ ] I have documented my code, in particular the intent of the
      hard-to-understand areas.
- [ ] (If necessary) I have updated the CHANGELOG.

title: Document errors happening due to block protocol version
body:
## Purpose

When querying a node for anything related to protocol version 4 baking/delegation state, the corresponding client methods return undocumented errors for blocks produced prior to protocol version 4.
